pages.text: These ancient warriors have once served a necromancer that had stolen a piece of dark magic. Their glaives can reach further than most swords and can damage multiple foes in front of them. Their shields might break after a single hit, but it will absorbed that hit completely.

If they're shield-less, right click on them with any Wooden Planks to give them their shield back when they're not attacking.$(br)One can call these creatures through the use of a $(l:focuses/necromancy/vanguard_focus)Vanguard Focus$(), or through a ritual which summons one without a limited lifespan.
